Blacknightmare::

"Then lets go"said Blacknightmare "It's time to test that thing, and 
soon could the second round start and I don't like stay here if 
Infectrons are in the second round.  "

Blacknightmare stood up and wait Orchestra.
--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Samir Duran" <1641coburn@h...> wrote:
> ::Orchestra::
> 
> "Well, no, I haven't had the time or the chance to test it, so 
trying it

willing to
> take," he replied.

have
